items.text: hangs the bat loosely to an away-nipping length ball and gets beaten
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Tharanga, no run

items.text: fullish, angled across on off, pats a drive into the covers
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Tharanga, no run

items.text: back of a length, angled across on off, opens the face and drops to point for one
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: full and wide, mistimed drive to cover
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Chandimal, no run

items.text: short of a length, angling on middle, turned away off the inside of the bat to deep square leg
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Chandimal, 1 run

items.text: short of a length, opens the face to point
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Tharanga, no run

items.preText: Usman: "run rate is dropping dangerously... one wicket at this stage will cancel advantage of SL so far..."
items.text: shortish, pulled to deep square leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chandimal, 1 run

items.text: fullish length, flicked to midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: mistimed sweep, lands safe. Fetches it from way outside off and skews it to deep midwicket region in the air
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chandimal, 2 runs
Shakib Al Hasan to Chandimal, 1 run

items.text: shortish, punched to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Tharanga, 2 runs

items.text: backs away and drops a length ball to cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Tharanga, no run

items.text: turned away to deep backward square leg
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Chandimal, 2 runs

items.text: fullish length, flicked off the pads behind square leg
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Chandimal, 1 run

items.text: short of a length, pitches outside leg, flicks into the leg side
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Tharanga, no run

items.text: short, sitting up nicely outside off but because he has to fetch it, he doesn't middle a pull. Enough to get it away to deep midwicket though and enough to give him his fifty
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Tharanga, FOUR runs

items.text: back of a length, off the outside of the bat to third man
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: good length, cuts in and he defends to point
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Chandimal, no run

items.text: good length on middle, flicked to square leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Tharanga, no run

items.text: comes down the track but it's too short to his liking. Can't meet the pitch and gets hit on the pad
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Tharanga, no run

items.text: gets down for a sweep and the ball slides in to trickle to fine leg off the pad
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Tharanga, 1 leg bye

items.text: full on middle and off, eased down to long-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chandimal, 1 run

items.text: full on middle, flicked off the pads to backward square leg with powerful wrists
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Tharanga, 1 run

items.preText: Dipendra: "Don'tyou think Sri Lanka are being over cautious here? Nothing explains that amout ofdot balls." Yep, dots definitely a concern.
items.text: and even as I say that, Chandimal gets down for an imperious reverse sweep over backward point. Much-needed ease in pressure
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chandimal, SIX runs

items.text: back of a length, opens the face and runs down to third man
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Tharanga, 1 run
